title: Remove DNS Setup option from navigation menu

requirements.summary: Remove the 'DNS Setup' menu item from the Navigation component's menuItems array
acceptanceCriteria: The 'DNS Setup' link no longer appears in the desktop navigation menu
The 'DNS Setup' link no longer appears in the mobile navigation menu
The menuItems array in Navigation.tsx does not contain any entry with label 'DNS Setup' or 'DNS Guide'

file_operations.description: Remove the 'DNS Setup' or 'DNS Guide' entry from the menuItems array while preserving all other menu items (Home, About Us, Team, Products, Farmer Support, Contact)

requirements.summary: Remove any 'dns-guide' or 'dns-setup' section ID references from the Navigation component's scroll handling and active state logic
acceptanceCriteria: No references to 'dns-guide' or 'dns-setup' exist in the Navigation component's scroll event handlers
No references to 'dns-guide' or 'dns-setup' exist in the Navigation component's active section state logic

file_operations.description: Remove any references to 'dns-guide' or 'dns-setup' section IDs from scroll event handlers and active section state logic while maintaining the core scroll and highlighting functionality for remaining sections
